T02D3465:118a-1: a'arya siddhe ka b'i ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3465:118a-3: 'phags pa dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3465:118a-4: dpal ldan 'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3465:118a-5: 'od gsal ston ka'i zla ba mtshungs //
T02D3465:118a-7: de yi sgrub thabs gsal po mchog / mdor bsdus bdag gis brjod par bgyi //
T02D3465:118a-8: dang por re zhig sngags pas yid dang mthun zhing
T02D3465:118a-9: gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su stan bde ba'i dbus su
T02D3465:118a-10: 'dug ste / rang gi snying gar aa yig las
T02D3465:118a-11: byung ba'i zla ba la mam dkar po de nyid
T02D3465:118a-12: 'dug ste / dgod par bya'o // de'i 'od zer
T02D3465:118a-13: gyis nam mkha' gang bas bcom ldan 'das dang bla
T02D3465:118a-14: ma rje btsun nam mkha' la bltas te /
T02D3465:118a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug la
T02D3465:118a-16: yid kyis rang bzhin gyi mchod pas 'jam dpal dang
T02D3465:118a-17: bla ma rje btsun yang mchod cing phyag btsal nas
T02D3465:118a-18: dge ba spel ba'i don du deng nas sdig pa
T02D3465:118a-19: thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags so //
T02D3465:118a-20: bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo //
T02D3465:118a-21: de yang bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu bdag gis yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o //
T02D3465:118a-22: byang chub ma thob kyi bar du sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3465:118a-23: yang dag pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D3465:118b-0: de nas @118b bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bon lhan cig tu gyur par blta'o //
T02D3465:118b-1: brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i khams gsum po thams cad
T02D3465:118b-2: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par dpyad mi
T02D3465:118b-5: gzugs brnyan lta bur blta zhing rang bzhin gyis 'od
T02D3465:118b-6: gsal ba yongs su dag pa 'ba' zhig gi bdag
T02D3465:118b-8: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes pa 'dis brtan par bya'o //
T02D3465:118b-9: yang na smon lam gyi stobs las byung ba'i zla ba la mam yig dkar po bltas te /
T02D3465:118b-10: de'i 'od zer 'phros pas 'jam dpal rdo rje bdag nyid la rab tu zhugs te /
T02D3465:118b-11: mam las byung bar bsgom mo //
T02D3465:118b-12: ston ka'i zla ba'i rnam pa can /
T02D3465:118b-13: zur phud lnga dang ldan pa /
T02D3465:118b-14: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3465:118b-15: phyag g-yon na autpa la sngon po bsnams pa /
T02D3465:118b-16: phyag g-yas pas mchog sbyin mdzad pa /
T02D3465:118b-17: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3465:118b-18: de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba la mam
T02D3465:118b-19: nor bu chu shel gyi 'od lta bu 'od zer
T02D3465:118b-20: rnams kyis nam mkha'i khong na gnas pa'i 'gro ba
T02D3465:118b-21: rnams kyi don byed pa gsal bzhin pa ji srid
T02D3465:118b-22: skyo bar ma gyur pad srid du bsgom par bya'o
T02D3465:118b-23: // bsgoms pas skyo na sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3465:118b-24: aom b'a kyee dam na ma:nye ba'i snying po yang bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3465:118b-25: aom hr'i h'um de nas yi ge brgya pa bzlas
T02D3465:118b-26: nas 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i nga rgyal byas te langs
T02D3465:118b-27: la yang de bzhin du gnas par bya'o zhes so
T02D3465:118b-28: // zla ba drug gis ngag gi dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D3465:118b-29: rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor bas skye ba 'di la sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D3465:118b-30: de ltar bsam gtan la gnas pas sngon du bsnyen
T02D3465:118b-31: pa 'bum phrag brgyad bzlas nas ral gri la sogs
T02D3465:118b-32: pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D3465:118b-33: de la zla ba gzas zin pa'am /
T02D3465:118b-34: nyi ma gzas zin pa la khab len gyi lcags
T02D3465:118b-35: las brdungs pa'i ral gri lag pas bzung ste zla
T02D3465:118b-36: ba la bltas nas ji srid grol bar ma gyur
T02D3465:118b-37: pa de srid du bzlas pa byas pas ral gri'i
T02D3465:118b-39: de bzhin du rdo rje dang /
T02D3465:118b-44: lcags kyu la sogs pa dang /
T02D3465:118b-48: dbang du bya ba'i rdzas la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D3465:119a-2: legs par sbyar ba rnams bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D3465:119a-5: mar dang bcas pa'i sha ka ras snod bkang ste /
T02D3465:119a-6: lag pas bkab la bzlas pa byas la bza' par bya'o //
T02D3465:119a-7: lo lnga brgya ru 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3465:119a-8: sran ma sha khar bcug la bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3465:119a-10: de mid na tshigs bcad la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
T02D3465:119a-12: ngag dang ldan zhing blo rno bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3465:119a-13: bil ba rnams kyi sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas
T02D3465:119a-14: na 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur
T02D3465:119a-15: ro // ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog dkar pos
T02D3465:119a-16: sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bzhi byas na ngag gi grub
T02D3465:119a-17: ro // pa thob ste / ngag gi dbang phyug dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
T02D3465:119a-18: mar dang 'bru dmar po lnga'i sbyin sreg byas na
T02D3465:119a-19: 'bum phrag bzhi tsam gyis gnod sbyin mo 'gugs par
T02D3465:119a-20: 'gyur ro // sa 'og gi gzhon nu ma yang ngo //
T02D3465:119a-21: brahma'i phye ma sor bzhi tsam la brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D3465:119a-22: mngon par bsngags la nang par snga bar dkyil 'khor
T02D3465:119a-23: byas la ji ltar 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das la
T02D3465:119a-24: mchod la mar ram kanydzi btung bar bya'o //
T02D3465:119a-25: shu dag zho phyed kyi tshad la de bzhin du
T02D3465:119a-26: mngon par bsngags la mar ram 'o ma'am mar khu
T02D3465:119a-27: dang / zla ba gcig tu btung bar bya'o //
T02D3465:119a-30: ldib pa rnams rnam par nyams par byed do //
T02D3465:119a-31: zla ba drug na gzhan yang ma thos pa'i bstan bcos rnams kyang mngon du 'gyur ro //
T02D3465:119a-32: rmongs pa rnam par nyams par 'gyur zhing thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02D3465:119a-33: khu byug ltar dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ba dang /
